title: Looking for Silver Support, or HIGH COMPETENT BRONZE.

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hello,

I am looking for a support to play with. I am an ADC main who has played for numerous years. Last season I did end silver but am shooting for no less then platinum this season that we are all currently enrolled in. Anyways no need for to much of a background story we can chat while we play. Lets get to what I am looking for.

Again I am searching for a support player preferably in Silver who is highly competent does not rage (I already do that enough for the both of us). Please have Discord: https://discord.gg/g3yeUuX  and basically be a heavy communicators team player and just know that you're not the reason thtat your team is losing games. If that sounds like you then you're my man .

To find me
Join: https://discord.gg/g3yeUuX  (Fastest Route)

along with adding me 

IN-GAME: metameg

Thanks folks I am the ADC that you have been waiting for for all you hardcore support players.

replies.body: You've posted on the OCE boards there fella
